## Packages


```{r}
set.seed(100000)
```

```{r}
stan_glmer(vote_choice_recoded ~ (1 | age_recoded_1.0) + 
                                 (1 | age_recoded_2.0) + 
                                 (1 | age_recoded_3.0) + 
                                 (1 | race_recoded_1) + 
                                 (1 | race_recoded_2) + 
                                 (1 | race_recoded_3) + 
                                 (1 | race_recoded_4) + 
                                 (1 | race_recoded_9) +
                                 (1 + male), data = df)
```
